Name: NinjaVillage
Description: This is a full stack e-commerce application inspired by the popular e-commerce site Amazon. Users can search, sell, purchase, and review products.

Name: Buzz
Description: This is a full stack spin-off of the popular business messaging application Slack. Users on Slack can share messages, images, setup communication channels for group collaboration, and take part in audio sessions within their organizations.

Name: AwayRental
Description: This is a full stack clone of the popular hosting site AirBnB. Users on AwayRental are able to host their properties for overnight stays, book other hosted properties, and review those properties.
